Articles.Content:
G'day wherever you are

my name is Karl, ive been a regular visitor to kerbin for about a year, but only made the step to the full version about a month ago.

Im not big on speeches so im going to let you folks take the mic now =]

Hi K.A.S.A,

Welcome to the Forums!

Don't forget to check out the awesome Add-Ons section for some excellent Mods and Plugins.

Hope you enjoy your stay!
Welcome ye of few words! What a great time to have the full version, .17 is full of things to do.

Hi Karl, welcome to the community

Have fun playing KSP, now go launch some rockets

Ive launched plenty of rockets, few seem to make it into orbit. none seem to leave orbit.

Ive tried nova punch remix and i love the extra variety of parts

Im also trying out a few others like deep space mission pack and mech jeb

Any others you folks recommend?
Yeah, basically try any of the add-ons on this page
